name: Python Desktop Lite + Flutter
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends git curl unzip xz-utils libglu1 || true && if [ ! -d /usr/local/flutter ]; then git clone -b stable https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git /usr/local/flutter && chmod -R a+rX /usr/local/flutter; fi && /usr/local/flutter/bin/flutter --version || true && /usr/local/flutter/bin/flutter doctor --no-fuchsia || true
